item.title: Digital Archiving
item.description: Librarians Helping Their Communities with Personal Digital Archiving

item.title: Photo Archiving
item.description: Backups and Archives are two different things. Ideally you should have a good archiving system, and your backup would be a redundant copy of that. In photography, a robust archiving system has between two and four copies of any file.
